name: MIMIC
description: Memorize the path as quickly as you can to reach the finish block in 100 unique levels and 10 different environments. Collect stars to unlock puzzles with increasing difficulty and added obstacles as you compete with other players on online leader boards. Create your own maps (NEW!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 or equivalent Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHZ Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent Storage: 600 MB available space
